articles.author: Anna Cooban, CNN Business
articles.title: Europe is finally coming after Russia's energy - CNN
articles.description: European leaders have planned to phase out Russian coal imports in response to harrowing scenes in Bucha, a suburb of Kyiv.

articles.author: Lili Bayer
articles.title: EU launches process to slash Hungary's funds over rule-of-law breaches - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Hungary is the first country to face proceedings under the new power.
articles.content:
The European Commission will soon trigger a powerful new mechanism to cut funding to Hungary for eroding the bloc’s rule-of-law standards, Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said Tuesday.
